iKON

Introduction

Ju-ne, formerly known as Junhoe, is the main vocalist from the boy group iKON, he is also an actor and composer. Before debuting, he appeared in the first season of "Kpop Star" and was a member of Team B in the survival show "W.I.N", later he also participated in "Mix & Match" and became the 4th confirmed member of iKON.

He is a big fan of poems and wishes to release a book one day. In 2020 he released through youtube a collaboration with Bobby "Deep Night" in the rock genre. He has been a fan of Michael Jackson since he was a child and has a large collection of the artist. He can play the guitar.

In 2023 he made his debut as an actor through the drama "Bora Deborah" receiving praise from the public for his skills, he also sang his first ost for the same drama. That same year he made his first English release through a collaboration with Soulbysel, with which he released his first song completely in English "Night Flight", he also got his first official solo song "Want you back" in iKON's 3rd full album.
